body_html: This is not how it is supposed to work and it is not a TensorFlow issue (edit: and not a missing feature). See tf.get_session_handle for a experimental workaround or tf.placeholder_with_default.
body_text: This is not how it is supposed to work and it is not a TensorFlow issue (edit: and not a missing feature). See tf.get_session_handle for a experimental workaround or tf.placeholder_with_default.
body:
This is not how it is supposed to work and it is **not** a TensorFlow issue (edit: and not a missing feature). See [`tf.get_session_handle`](
https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/get_session_handle) for a experimental workaround or `tf.placeholder_with_default`.
